com.davidmiguel.gobees.addeditapiary

Class AddEditApiaryPresenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.davidmiguel.gobees.addeditapiary.AddEditApiaryPresenter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AddEditApiaryContract.Presenter, GoBeesDataSource.GetApiaryCallback, GoBeesDataSource.TaskCallback, BasePresenter, com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.ConnectionCallbacks, com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.OnConnectionFailedListener, com.google.android.gms.location.LocationListener

    class AddEditApiaryPresenter
extends java.lang.Object
implements AddEditApiaryContract.Presenter, GoBeesDataSource.GetApiaryCallback, GoBeesDataSource.TaskCallback, com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.ConnectionCallbacks, com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.OnConnectionFailedListener, com.google.android.gms.location.LocationListener
    Listens to user actions from the UI AddEditApiaryFragment, retrieves the data and updates the UI as required.
